message.body: we got answers back on our requests
but they are giving us a credit for the washer and dryer
they are going to give us a unit cost estimate on the basement windows
did you guys look into seller assist at all?
It has nothing to do with them
I guess they are worried about the loan being rejected
since you are technically taking out a loan for more than the contract price of the house
that is the only thing I can think of
so did you guys agree to it?
just waiting for the 10yr yield to drop below 3.6 so Craig can get me 4.875 with no points
in general does the 10 year note rate go down when the stock market goes up?
directly unrelated - but similar factors effect each so can move together a lot
basically need to know which way to root so that number goes down getting me a better mortgage rate
somehow I got copied on this girls email about this weekend
so I keep getting their update
ok you can't get me in trouble
but I am going to leak you some info
kristen wrote "I'm happy to head straight back to brooklyn after the game even if the boys want to stay longer. as long as somebody can direct us there. "
then your wife writes "We could also go to a bar in brooklyn to watch the game --there are lots."
I think we would rather go to the SU bar right?
it doesn't seem to be a real SU bar
remember that weekend you were going to come up
and I called you and was like hey, i just walked by a bar with a big SU flag
i need to find that bar
the bar I checked out last night had good screens
is the hill not a good choice?
i called them and they said they'll ahve the game but maybe not sound
the girl i talked to was an idiot
i might walk over there today
I have decided I ain't doing shit today
willy can't even respond to the write chain
also make sure they have directv because the game is on MASN not SNY tomorrow
I think it is on Full Court too
yeah SNY has tape delay and MASN has it live
but I am sure they will have Full Court
trying to get willy fired up
do you remember around when we had that conversation?
it was for a Cuse football game, right?
I remember town tavern and the hill
prob would have been the Main game?
was that what it was for?
what about that tiny bar - was that a cuse bar?
see if you can find it on your gmail
what am I looking for exactly?
i sent you a link I think to the bar in the midtown area
i hate myself for not writing that down
dude you know the maine weekend we hung out
we had the games schedueld and everything
I posted on the syracuse board(1st post) asking where the best place to watch the game is
Most of the NYC crew will be at The Hill (corner of 30th and 3rd). They treat us pretty well there with drinks and appetizer specials and we normally get a big crowd.
i'm going there at lunch to confirm
What is the best bar to watch the Cuse game tomorrow in NYC?
i just nailed that shit bunk
so the Hill it is don't you think?
plus it would be a little annoying for us to park in brookly, tain to manhattan for like 2 or 3 hours then turn right around and go back to brooklyn
I mean it owuldn't be that big of a deal
well do you want to be in BK then?
are you guys going to BKlyn first?
we drive to BK and park
only parking there so we have it on sunday morning since we will be sleeping there
that way we just drop the car off
meet up with you guys at the hill
if we went back to bk to watch the game it would be a little annoying
alright send out the official announcement that we are watching the game at the Hill
squash the BK idea before it ever builds any steam
he did suck this past year
you guys will definitely need a DE in the draft now
unless you go after Julius Peppers
get lojack and tapp out on the field more
thinks we should be able to lock on Monday at 4.875 with no points
who do you think will be the best QB from this class 5 years from now
i'd say JC or Sam are the 2 best bets right?
I got myself all worked up over clausen a few weeks ago
i'm telling you when he measure 6 feet tall
but scouts get all about that
yeah but scouts don't dictate how he plays in 5 years
cause of throwing lanes and crap
but I just asked in 5 years
and I said either Bradford or Clausen
we should call willy and joey bunk all draft weekend
I think Bradford will be injury prone
yeah but snead kind of sucked
which will cause him to drop
true but this year all eyes were on him and he blew
yeah and robinson is having a good week
Brown doesn't seem to have any killer instinct you know
Becky's place in Brooklyn is in the middle of nowhere
very difficult to get to via subway
would it make sense for you guys to drive in Manhattan and then we drive back to BK after the Cuse game?
dont think we could all fit though
me, beth, kristen, greg, erin, seth, amy
otherwise I would have no problem
can get 4 girls in the back
there is going to bea lot of shit
nothing is easy about this weekend
how far is her place from subway?
you sent me that thing yesterday and looked like it was 2 blocks
that was where the party is

Erin, if you are traveling from your neighborhood I would hop on the F. Take it to Jay Street, transfer to the C and either get off a Lafayette and walk about 20 minutes OR you can get off at Hoyt Schimerhorn and transfer to the G. Get off at Clinton Washington. Then you'll want to walk down Clinton, make a RIGHT on Myrtle and a LEFT on Waverly
yeah--that's a pain in the ass
from the bar we'd have to transfer twice
we could cab the last part of the walk
basically Becky's place is in a horrible location
but girls might be in heels and shit for the party
if the girls head there first
can becky not pick them up?
then when we come we can iether walk or someone can come gte us
especially since it involves them making decisions
everything is super easy when we get together
Craigmeister said we should be golden on Monday morning
so I asked my buddy about bars in BKlyn...just in case
so i think we just do The Hill
yeah walking 20 min doesn't bother me -- the girls on the other hand
then the girls leave after the game via car
knew exactly whre you were headed
that way they get there a little earlier
and one can come get us too
maybe stop at another bar on the way
dude I am right with you
plus i am very comfortable parking aroud your house
I know right where to go you know
then we can all head to the bar together
or you can drive up to the bar
would you guys go to BK first or come straight to NYC?
no need to go to BK
check with your wife just to make sure--they can change at our place before driving back to BK...just park by our apt
why would we go to BK first?
i only asked cause I didn't know if you guys needed to drop something off for becky
I assume it all can stay in the car
but just come to NYC, park by us, we go to the bar
then the girls leave after the game
so...what time will you guys get to our place you think?
what time is the Sr. Bowl?
not sure yet - need to talk to seth
ok it always seems and is so easy when it is just us figuring things out
I am now talking to Kristen -- not as easy as "done"
our lives would be completely stress free
see mad crazy dunks from Wes and KJ
my plan is going over well
kristen tells me to send it
